translation:
Piratini, October 26, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir

Antônio José Bonilha follows this point with the intention of loading some carts with flour seized on the schooner “Mineira”; therefore may Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of Finance in Piratini, October 26, 1838. Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Police Commander of Boqueirão. Domingos José de Almeida

Dispatch from His Excellency, October 26, received on November 1.

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães General Police Commander of Boqueirão From the Ministry of Finance
